name: episode-03
description: - Create a `Nested header Element` using `React.createElement`(h1,h2,h3 inside a div with class "title")     - Create the `same element using JSX`     - Create a `functional component of the same with JSX`     - `Pass attribute` into the tag in `JSX`     - `Composition of Component` (Add a component inside another)     - `{TitleComponent}` vs `{<TitleComponent/>}` vs `{<TitleComponent></TitleComponent>}` in JSX.
